title: Hero Holiday
description: ~ She was hoping for a hero, but never realized who she would save. ~  This is a contemporary, new adult romance serial. For 18+ readers.  Kate Samuel and Lieutenant Matt Lewis were finally together. With Kate's attacker still on the loose, it didn't seem like they could ever have peace of mind. Even with the power and wealth of Matt's billionaire status, they were not safe.  When the men behind Kate's attack threaten her life again, Matt takes matters into his own hands. Their escape to the Hamptons for Christmas seems like the perfect solution. But was Kate ready to face the ghosts of her Christmas past?
author: Bella Love-Wins
